name: nimblest/ExternalEvents
description: Quickly create a connection to SNS topics. Just create a Laravel listener and send data up to the topic of your choice. Easy setup using Spatie Fractal.

suggest.laravel/framework: Needed to create a listener to attach to the event.
suggest.spatie/laravel-fractal: Used to transform the data you send up to your topic.
suggest.aws/aws-sdk-php-laravel: Needed to setup the connection to SNS.
